Headline: Temporary Southbound X49 Western Express and #49 Western Reroute near Western/Pershing
ShortDescription: Southbound X49 Western Express and 49 Western buses are temporarily rerouted near Western/Pershing.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound X49 Western Express and #49 Western buses are temporarily rerouted via Western, Ave, Archer, Western Blvd, 43rd, Western Ave, and resume normal route, due to street blockage near Western/Pershing.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Temporary Westbound #103 West 103rd  Reroute near 103rd/Pulaski
ShortDescription: Westbound 103 West 103rd buses are temporarily rerouted near 103rd/Pulaski.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #103 West 103rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 103rd, Pulaski, 100th layover Brother Rice High School, Pulaski, 103rd, and resume normal route, due to street blockage near 103rd/Pulaski.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Kimball-bound Brown Line Service Delayed at Belmont
ShortDescription: Kimball-bound Brown Line trains are standing at Belmont due to police department activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Kimball-bound Brown Line trains are standing at Belmont due to police department activity.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Linden-bound Purple Line Delays
ShortDescription: Linden-bound Purple Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following earlier police activity at Belmont. Service is resuming, allow extra time

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Linden-bound Purple Line trains are running with residual delays and congestion following earlier police activity at Belmont.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
